Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Quality Hotel Bielefeld in Bielefeld (Sennestadt), you'll be within the vicinity of Bielefeld Japanese Garden and Bielefeld Hospital Chapel. This hotel is within the vicinity of Sparrenberg Castle and Neustaedter Marienkirche.

Rooms
Stay in one of 102 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include complimentary bottled water and blackout drapes/curtains, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreational amenities such as a sauna and a fitness center. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Quality Hotel Bielefeld. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Bielefeld? This hotel features 215 square feet (20-98 square meters) of event facilities. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Quality Hotel Bielefeld. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include complimentary bottled water and blackout drapes/curtains, and housekeeping is provided daily.

With a stay at Quality Hotel Bielefeld in Bielefeld (Sennestadt), you'll be within the vicinity of Bielefeld Japanese Garden and Bielefeld Hospital Chapel. This hotel is within the vicinity of Sparrenberg Castle and Neustaedter Marienkirche.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Bielefeld Japanese Garden - 6 km / 3.7 mi
Bielefeld Hospital Chapel - 7.5 km / 4.6 mi
Sparrenberg Castle - 7.8 km / 4.8 mi
Neustaedter Marienkirche - 8 km / 5 mi
Museum Huelsmann - 8.3 km / 5.1 mi
Kunsthalle Bielefeld - 8.3 km / 5.1 mi
Theater Bielefeld - 8.3 km / 5.1 mi
Old Market Square - 8.3 km / 5.2 mi
Old Town Hall - 8.3 km / 5.2 mi
Historical Museum Bielefeld - 8.3 km / 5.2 mi
Nicolai Church - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi
Farmhouse Museum - 9.3 km / 5.8 mi
Olderdissen Animal Park - 9.4 km / 5.9 mi
Schuco Arena - 9.8 km / 6.1 mi
Zoo Safaripark Stukenbrock - 10 km / 6.2 mi

The preferred airport for Quality Hotel Bielefeld is Paderborn (PAD-Paderborn - Lippstadt) - 37.9 km / 23.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Hannover Airport (HAJ): Approximate driving time to the Quality Hotel Bielefeld is 90 minutes and distance is 110 kilometres (68 miles).

Getting there: The S5 S-Bahn line runs from the train station at the airport to Hannover central station every 30 minutes from 5 AM to midnight. The journey time is 15-20 minutes and a single ticket is â‚¬2.40. From here, take a train to Bielefeld Station and then a taxi to the hotel. All prices are subject to change.

Driving directions:From the airport take the A352 in the direction of Dortmund. At the junction for Hannover/West change onto A2 for Dortmund. Continue until Exit 26 for Bielefeld-Sennestadt. Turn right onto the B68, at the crossing turn right onto Verlerstrasse and at the next traffic lights turn left into Alte Verler Strasse.

Getting around: Bielefeld is well served by buses and trams.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
